logs.message: logging.debug(f"Entering is_recent with days={days} for product id={self.id}")
logging.debug(f"Entering matches() with query='{query}' for product {self}")
logging.debug(f"Entering from_dict with raw data keys: {list(raw.keys())}")
logging.error(f'Failed to create Product from dict: {raw}', exc_info=True)
logging.debug(f"Entering add_product with product: {product}")
logging.debug(f"Entering find method with query: {query}")
logging.debug(f"Entered recent_products with days={days}")
logging.info(f'Total inventory value calculated: {sum(p.price for p in self.products)}')
logging.debug(f"Entering Inventory.from_dict with raw data keys: {list(raw.keys())}")
logging.debug(f"Initializing PricingClient with base_url={base_url} and timeout={timeout}")
logging.debug(f"Entering _url with sku={sku}")
logging.debug(f"Entered fetch_remote_prices with SKUs: {list(skus)}")
logging.error(f'Failed to fetch remote prices from {url} for SKUs {skus}', exc_info=True)
logging.info(f'Fetched remote prices for SKUs: {skus}, result count: {len(result)}')
logging.debug(f"Entering load_inventory with path: {path}")
logging.info(f'Loaded inventory from {path} with {len(data)} items')
logging.error(f'Failed to load inventory from {path} with data: {data}', exc_info=True)
logging.debug(f"Entering save_inventory with path={path} and inventory items count={len(inv.items)}")
logging.error(f'Failed to save inventory to {path} with payload {payload}', exc_info=True)
logging.debug(f"Starting apply_price_updates for inventory with {len(prices)} price entries.")
logging.info(f'Price updates applied: {updated} items updated at {now}')
logging.debug(f"Entered summarize_inventory with inventory containing {len(inv.items)} items")
logging.info(f"Summarized inventory for store {inv.store_id}: total={total}, avg_price={avg_price}, recent={recent}")
logging.debug(f"Entered pick_random_product with cheap_only={cheap_only}, inventory size={len(inv.products)}")
logging.info(f"Selected random product from {len(candidates)} candidates")
logging.debug(f"Entered main function with data_dir={data_dir}, base_url={base_url}")
logging.error('Exception occurred in main function', exc_info=True)
